name: Totally Fine Computer
description:
A game made for Wowie game jam 2.0 But unfortunately we weren't able to upload it on time but here it is. The theme for the jam was "Intentional Bugs"

It's about a computer that plays retro games but each game has a bug in it that won't let you beat the game . So you got to fix the game by killing the bug

But to get the chance to kill the bug there are some things you must do in-game so that it will let its guard down

So this game is a puzzle/shoot'em all/platformer/top down shooter.
